sn15.19:4.3: No first point is found of sentient beings roaming and transmigrating, hindered by ignorance and fettered by craving.
sn15.19:4.4: It’s not easy to find a sentient being who in all this long time has not previously been your daughter.
sn15.19:4.7: No first point is found of sentient beings roaming and transmigrating, hindered by ignorance and fettered by craving.
sn15.19:4.8: For such a long time you have undergone suffering, agony, and disaster, swelling the cemeteries.
sn15.19:4.9: This is quite enough for you to become disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed from all conditions.”
